org.educraft.entity

Class NumberSkeleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.entity.Entity
      • net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase
        • net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.entity.IRangedAttackMob, net.minecraft.entity.monster.IMob, net.minecraft.entity.passive.IAnimals, INumberMob

    public class NumberSkeleton
extends net.minecraft.entity.monster.EntitySkeleton
implements INumberMob
    Customised skeleton that drops a multiple of ten between 10 and 100 upon death, instead of its normal drops.

      • attackEntityFrom

        public boolean attackEntityFrom(net.minecraft.util.DamageSource source,
                       float damage)
        Called whenever this skeleton is attacked. It ensures that the skeleton only drops a number after being killed by a Maths Wand.
        Overrides:
        attackEntityFrom in class net.minecraft.entity.monster.EntityMob
        Parameters:
